title: President Donald J. Trump’s Tax Cuts Will Generate Greater Economic Opportunity For All – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Budget & Spending	

Issued on:
April 16, 2018
We’re fighting to give every American — all over the country, every single American — a future of dignity and purpose and of pride.
						President Donald J. Trump					ENCOURAGING ENTREPRENEURSHIP: Small business owners will be able to grow and thrive under the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.GREATER OPPORTUNITY FOR WORKERS: The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act will help spur more business growth and job creation, benefiting American workers.REVITALIZING COMMUNITIES: The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act signed into law by President Donald J. Trump will expand economic opportunity in underserved communities.
